core_observations: Compiler implements deterministic normalization + canonical ordering + hash-derived predicate IDs.
All six required action classes are represented in ActionClass enum and coverage logic.
Structured event codes VEF-COMPILE-001/002 and classified ERR codes are implemented.
Round-trip semantic projection helpers and determinism-focused unit tests are present in-module.

probe_results.detail: test target not registered in default-run packages

handoff_recommendations: Implement checker + unit-test harness first to establish deterministic verification loop.
Add golden vector fixture and compiler report artifact generation.
Emit section verification evidence/summary artifacts and close bead after checker/tests pass.
If Rust conformance tests must run under cargo, wire an explicit integration test target path in Cargo.toml or move test into discoverable target layout.
